name: A Nu Start
description:
This Visual Novel began initial development as a submission for the Fresh Start GAB Jam, but unfortunately, massive scheduling conflicts left me unable to complete in time for the deadline. The only route with any extra dialog is the Bartender route.

I plan on continuing to work on the project in my own time, with the final product aiming for 3 playable routes, totaling at maybe around 2 hours or so of gameplay.
